consentText:
Thank routes during  background and in urban travel.

Your participation is voluntary and should take approximately five minutes. You may decline to answer any question and can exit the survey at any time prior to submission.

No personally identifiable information will be collected, and responses will be stored securely and analyzed in aggregate. By continuing, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old and consent to the collection of your responses for research purposes.Thank routes during  background and in urban travel.

scenarioText.line1: The time-efficient route takes approximately {defaultTime} minutes.
scenarioText.line2: The {label} route prioritizes safety and takes about {alternativeTime} minutes.
scenarioText.line3: Use the toggle below to activate the {label} route if you prefer safety over speed.
